StreamEncryption.description: When specified, enables or updates server-side encryption using an AWS KMS key for a specified stream. Removing this property from your stack template and updating your stack disables encryption.

properties.name: EncryptionType
properties.description: The encryption type to use. The only valid value is KMS.

type.description: The encryption type to use. The only valid value is KMS.

properties.name: KeyId
properties.description: The GUID for the customer-managed AWS KMS key to use for encryption. This value can be a globally unique identifier, a fully specified Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to either an alias or a key, or an alias name prefixed by "alias/".You can also use a master key owned by Kinesis Data Streams by specifying the alias aws/kinesis.

type.description: The GUID for the customer-managed AWS KMS key to use for encryption. This value can be a globally unique identifier, a fully specified Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to either an alias or a key, or an alias name prefixed by "alias/".You can also use a master key owned by Kinesis Data Streams by specifying the alias aws/kinesis.

StreamModeDetails.description: When specified, enables or updates the mode of stream. Default is PROVISIONED.

Tag.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) to associate with the Kinesis stream.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the Kinesis stream.

type.description: The name of the Kinesis stream.

properties.name: RetentionPeriodHours
properties.description: The number of hours for the data records that are stored in shards to remain accessible.

type.description: The number of hours for the data records that are stored in shards to remain accessible.

properties.name: ShardCount
properties.description: The number of shards that the stream uses. Required when StreamMode = PROVISIONED is passed.

type.description: The number of shards that the stream uses. Required when StreamMode = PROVISIONED is passed.

properties.name: StreamEncryption
properties.description: When specified, enables or updates server-side encryption using an AWS KMS key for a specified stream.

type.description: When specified, enables or updates server-side encryption using an AWS KMS key for a specified stream.

properties.name: StreamModeDetails
properties.description: The mode in which the stream is running.

type.description: The mode in which the stream is running.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key–value pairs) to associate with the Kinesis stream.

type.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key–value pairs) to associate with the Kinesis stream.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the Kinesis stream

type.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the Kinesis stream
